column5: My beautiful apartment is conveniently   located near the shops at La Cantera,   The Rim, I-10 and 1604. 20 minutes from   the Riverwalk.  The place comes with amenities such as:   Smart TV, Wi-Fi, Cups, bowls, plates,   Silverware, and utensils to cook with.   Has a cute patio with a beautiful view of   the sunset. Equiped with Vivint Smart   door lock and Alarm for ease of entry.
column8: Luxury Top-Floor Apartment 3 miles from La Cantera
